features: WASHING MACHINE SOFTENER SHEETS: Soulnk's ultra concentrated clothes softener is designed to soften clothes in the washing machine. This product easily and completely dissolves without leaving any residue on your clothes and can be used in any standard or HE washing machine on both hot and cold water settings.
INGREDIENT SAFE - Soulink fabric softener sheets are free of parabens, phosphates, bleach and dyes，also septic and gray water safe. It can be used on sensitive skin and babies.

EASY TO USE-Liquidlese design makes washing easy. No measuring is required, simply follow the directions and place the desired fabric softener strips. It won't stain your clothes and is lightweight and easy to carry, perfect for when you are traveling.

PROTECT YOUR CLOTHING - The agitation, spinning and heat of the laundry process can damage your clothes at the fiber level, as well as the static electricity caused by clothes rubbing against each other during everyday use. The use of soulink laundry softener sheetss reduces fiber damage caused by friction, fights static electricity, enhances softness, and reduces wrinkles. Static electricity can be caused by the friction of clothes in daily use.

ECO-FRIENDLY - Soulink uses more environmentally friendly laundry detergent tablets, both in terms of ingredients and packaging.All of Soulink's ingredients are environmentally friendly. We do not use plastic jugs in our packaging, which is lighter and more portable. Use biodegradable packaging to reduce carbon emissions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as good as my regular fabric dryer sheets!
reviews.reviewText: I like these fabric softener sheets. To be fair, they don’t work any better than my current dryer sheets, but they’re just as good, with a better price point and more environmentally friendly. The sheets are unscented (no added fragrance), but they do have a very slight smell from the other ingredients in them. This smell disappears in the wash. I used the sheets in the washing machine, just before the rinse cycle. I intentionally didn’t put them in with the laundry detergent as I wanted to test the sheets on their own, without them interacting with the detergent. My laundry came out of the washing machines scent free and with no trace of the sheets left behind. Out of the dryers the laundry was noticeably soft, static free, and had slightly fewer wrinkles than usual. No residue on my clothes or sheets, no stains or discoloration, and no weakened fabrics (this happened once when I was testing detergent sheets). Definitely a better option than liquid fabric softeners, and a more affordable option than fabric dryer sheets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s odd at first to toss these in the washer, but our laundry was soft and unscented.
reviews.reviewText: Soulink Fabric Softener Sheets for Washing Machine (Unscented)The box of fabric softener sheets arrived in a box with perforations that create an opening flap and allow for a tabbed closure. However, it’s a bit awkward to remove a sheet since the sheets are larger than the opening; I had to bend and perforate each one to get them out. I’m also wondering how easy it will be to remove a sheet once the ones above the part of the box connected to the closure tab are gone, since it seems like that might get in the way.The sheets look like laundry detergent sheets, but these are brittle and will break apart, unlike the soft and flexible detergent sheets. There’s not much of a scent to them, so they seem unscented to me even though the vague “Natural Fragrance” is the last ingredient. It’s also odd that “Scent Booster” is listed on the box.It felt weird to toss fabric softener sheets (with detergent sheets!) on top of the wash at first, but this is our second brand of these (the other ones weren’t brittle like these), so we’ve gotten used to it. We have a top-loading HE machine, and these worked well and left no residue. I used these softener sheets in three loads of laundry, two loads in eco-warm and one in cold, and it all came out soft and unscented. I used a full sheet (two perforated half sheets) in each medium to large load, which is what almost all our laundry is; we’ll rarely use just half a sheet.I like these sheets for the same reasons I like detergent sheets. These are lightweight, there’s no heavy plastic jug, and they are easier to store. Once we got used to the concept and saw that they worked well, it was an easy switch to make. Made in China

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent Fabric Softener alternative
reviews.reviewText: This is a different approach to fabric softener using a sheet instead of liquid. When using, the instructions are a little vague in regards to how many sheets you should be utilizing. It says that you should use two sheets for 5 lb of laundry, which can seem a little confusing. Overall, besides that little confusion, they seem to work okay. My clothes at the end still felt like they had a waxy residue. After taking out the dryer, I feel like there was more static than compared to when I use a dryer sheet. So, at the end of the day, if you're looking for an eco-friendly alternative, it's worth considering, but it isn't the best that I've seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked for my towels.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the instructions to put the sheet in the washer instead of the dryer, given that they are fabric softener sheets. I would think that the effect would wash away in the rinse cycle. So I was pleasantly surprised that I could tell my towels were softened after the dryer. I can definitely tell what my towels feel like with no softener, so I feel very confident saying that these sheets worked. Super convenient to use and I love the no-plastic bottle aspect. I know that dryer sheets get a bad rap, so if you are worried about the ingredients in those, you might want to check these out, since the clothes get rinsed after being exposed to the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These aren’t what I’m used to so I was a bit skeptical going in. I usually use a liquid in the washer or a dry sheet in the dryer. I used these in my front loader, adding the soap sheet in the dispenser and tossing this on top of the clothes. The first run I did was only towels, and later tried clothes after my confidence went up. The towels were surprisingly soft and the scent was the faint scent of my soap, just as I had hoped. The only downfall was that the sheets did tear a little when removed. They’re divided, so you can use half if needed. I would recommend these, and they’re great for folks who don’t like the extra scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Easy! Soft clothes.
reviews.reviewText: What a great idea. So easy and so simple. Just toss the softener sheets in the washer with everything else and forget about it. The sheets were perforated, so you choose how much you need, according to the size of you load. I had a very large load of laundry, so I used two full sheets, after reading the instructions. The sheets had a very light scent, very pleasant, not heavy with perfume, but light, almost indiscernible. My laundry came out soft and feeling great. There was no scent, but a freshness from the clothes. I really liked the way these performed.What a great product, and so easy to use. Fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong description -- They are scented
reviews.reviewText: I used them today and they are definitely scented unlike mentioned in the description. Box clearly says they can be used for eliminating odor and freshening your clothes. Apart from that works great. I try to use them less as they can damage your washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a great product that I wish I'd discovered years ago. I live in a very small condo with a small laundry area, so efficiency in buying products is really important. These sheets are an incredible value. I've used only 3 of 240 (seriously!) and they work beautifully. They dissolve with no residue inside the washer or on clothes and are truly scent-free. I split them up into smaller bundles in baggies to keep them fresh and not "dry out". I'm not sure that's necessary, but I did it anyway as it's 240 loads! I love them.
